definition: to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Do not go for wealth ; even that fades away.
sentences.chinese: 不要追求萬貫家財，財產也會散盡。

sentences.english: His son diced himself out of a large fortune.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子擲骰子賭輸了萬貫家財。
